public ref class InputBindingCollection sealed : System::Collections::IList
type InputBindingCollection = class interface IList interface ICollection interface IEnumerable

summary.span: Représente une collection ordonnée d’objets .

span.span: Represents an ordered collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Tous les objets qui dérivent de ont un nommé .All objects that derive from have an named . Tous les objets qui dérivent de ont un nommé .All objects that derive from have an named . Toutefois, si ces collections sont définies dans [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], puis les éléments dans la collection doivent être des classes dérivées de plutôt que direct objets.However, if these collections are set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)], then the items in the collection must be derived classes of rather than direct objects. Il s’agit, car ne prend pas en charge un constructeur public par défaut.This is because does not support a default public constructor. Par conséquent, les éléments dans un qui a été défini dans [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] sera généralement un classe dérivée qui prend en charge un constructeur public par défaut, tel que ou .Therefore, the items in a that was set in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] will typically be an derived class that does support a default public constructor, such as or . ## Examples L’exemple suivant crée un et l’associe un .The following example creates a and associates it with a . Le est ajouté à la sur un .The is added to the on a . [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)]

remarks.format: ## Examples L’exemple suivant crée un et l’associe un .The following example creates a and associates it with a . Le est ajouté à la sur un .The is added to the on a . [!code-xaml[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewXAMLKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#commandingoverviewxamlkeybinding)] [!code-csharp[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] [!code-vb[commandingoverviewsnippets#CommandingOverviewKeyBinding](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/CommandingOverviewSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#commandingoverviewkeybinding)] Le [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] exemple n’utilise pas littéralement , mais est appelé implicitement par le [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] prise en charge pour les collections de traitement.The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] example does not literally use , but is called implicitly by the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] processing support for collections. Pour plus d’informations sur [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] et collections, consultez [vue d’ensemble de XAML (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).For details on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)] and collections, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md).
